[SYNTAX]: Overly complex sentence structures (e.g., multiple nested clauses).
[LEXICON]: Archaic vocabulary and formal tone may impede modern readability.
[STYLE]: Passive voice and lengthy descriptions disrupt flow in some passages.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transitions between historical context, travel anecdotes, and Manila description.
[TRANSITION]: Lack of explicit connections between paragraphs (e.g., Philippine event to Honolulu detour).
[LOGIC]: Unrelated subtopics (e.g., surf-shooting, Neptune’s Revels) disrupt narrative cohesion.

[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex sentence structures may slightly impede immediate clarity.

[STRUCTURE]: Transitions between historical description, personal experience, and emotional scenes could be smoother for fully cohesive flow.

[SYNTAX]: Occasionally wordy phrasing (e.g., "a method new to us and one not usually employed").

[LOGIC]: Historical tangent (1742 pension) conflicts with Philippine context.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt shifts between unrelated topics (e.g., dinner → servant management → tableware origins → city vs. rural life) without transitional links.
